# Interface LLMChatNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface

Represents the properties for the LLM node execution config.

interface LLMChatNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface {  
llm_component_id: string;  
reportToClient?: boolean;  
textGenerationConfig: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/nodes/NodeExecutionConfig.LLMChatNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface))

  * [NodeExecutionConfig](/classes/graph_nodes_NodeExecutionConfig.NodeExecutionConfig)
    * LLMChatNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface



##### Index

### Properties

llm_component_id reportToClient? textGenerationConfig

## Properties

### llm_component_id

llm_component_id: string

LLM component ID that was registered in the component registry

### `Optional`reportToClient

reportToClient?: boolean

Whether to report to the client.

Inherited from [NodeExecutionConfig](/classes/graph_nodes_NodeExecutionConfig.NodeExecutionConfig).[reportToClient](/classes/graph_nodes_NodeExecutionConfig.NodeExecutionConfig#reporttoclient)

### textGenerationConfig

textGenerationConfig: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface)

The text generation config.
